website_summaries.verdict: These iconic, knee-high riding boots are perfect for those with wider calves, and are stylish, functional, and come in a wide variety of colors to suit everyone's interests.
pros: Designed for women with athletic legs
Great price point for a leather boot
cons: If you have a thinner leg, they might be too loose

customer_reviews.title: Measure your Calves, Ladies
customer_reviews.text: Nice pair of boots but my legs were swimming in them. The boot opening is huge compared to my calves (I'm 5'6" 110lbs 13.5" calves). I should have paid more attention to the boot opening dimension. Everything else seems great though: comfortable, relatively accurate sizing (they are on the larger side), good traction, quality leather/hardware, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie

customer_reviews.title: Great stylish classic boots!
customer_reviews.text: Great color and fit. I Habsburg already gotten so many compliments. The W is not wide calf it’s for the foot fit. The foot area feels right but I’m sure they will loosen with more wear.
customer_reviews.author: @vsievents

customer_reviews.title: Different color boots
customer_reviews.text: I have these boots in black so I knew what to expect. I ordered a brown pair but theyes are different shades and it's noticeable.
customer_reviews.author: Cesar

customer_reviews.title: Definitely regret this purchase
customer_reviews.text: I took a chance on buying boots online and boy, was it a mistake. I ordered a half size up and they're still really tight! I think they run slightly narrow. I have normal sized legs and they barely zipped over my calves. For the record, I'm 5'9" and a size 8-10. I shouldn't require wide calf boots. The zipper on the back cut into my leg pretty bad. Looks like I paid 150 for a one wear item. I'm not saying don't buy them, but unless you have super narrow feet and tiny little legs, I don't recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Nola

customer_reviews.title: Just a little tight around...
customer_reviews.text: the ankle so definitely size up a 1/2 size. Other than that the boots are beautiful, receive compliments all the time. Well made product and a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Geri P.

customer_reviews.title: these smelled like plastic, not leather
customer_reviews.text: Fake... these smelled like plastic, not leather, when they arrived. I realized they were knock offs when the label was rubber on the sole instead of being the silver "Sam Edelman" label. Needless to say, these were returned, and I ordered real ones from the Sam Edelman site. The real ones smell like leather, and arrived a beautiful whiskey color.
customer_reviews.author: kenneth hager

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and fashionable
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots, i have 16" calf and they fit perfectly, bit narrow but it's leather so it will stretch. Great color, looks good with jeans and a skirt/dress.
customer_reviews.author: Eva Kubus

customer_reviews.title: REAL wide calf boots!
customer_reviews.text: I have a wide calf- 17 inches to be exact. All other real leather boots that claim to be wide calf, are not. I’ve ordered wide calf from various brands-Patricia Nash, Vince Camuto, Guess, Bandolino, Lucky brand etc and I’ve sadly returned all of them due to be too small in the calf area. I’ve been on a search for 3 years (not kidding) for the perfect cognac leather wide calf boot and thank God for these! Now I can’t wait to order them in black!!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Fuentes

customer_reviews.title: My second pair of Sam Edelman Penny boots!
customer_reviews.text: I just love these boots. I have them in brown as well, which I bought I think 4 years ago. And I still wear those. These boots fit true to size. I am a size 10, and my feet are somewhat wide, but the regular 10M works for me. For me, it has been worth investing in $150 boots that I can wear for several years than buying a $30-$50 pair of boots that I have to replace every year or every other year. The leather on these boots is very soft and I love the back zipper and diagonal design. I would recommend these boots!
customer_reviews.author: M.C.

customer_reviews.title: Waited a long time for a fit like this....
customer_reviews.text: I am 61 years young and these are the FIRST boots I have ever had that fit my extra wide calf, yet are not bulky at the ankle. The leather is soft, the style is amazing and the fit is perfect for me. My 30 something daughter is a style blogger and bought these herself at the suggestion of a fellow blogger. I can't thank her enough for giving me the tip. I also bought these in black. Thanks, Sam Edelman, for finally realizing that those of us with wide calves want to be in style.
customer_reviews.author: Judith E. Vandenberg

customer_reviews.title: Too tall for this 5'4" woman.
customer_reviews.text: I have to say that I fell in love with these as soon as they came out of the box; unfortunately, they are too tall and cut into the back of my knee. I'm 5'4" with a 31" inseam and I couldn't climb my stairs nor sit down as the boot was into the back of my knee. Too bad, the boot is incredibly soft and beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Shoregirl24

customer_reviews.title: ... B S O L U T E L Y LOVE!!
customer_reviews.text: A B S O L U T E L Y LOVE!!! Make sure you size down. I wear a 8.5 and had exchange for an 8. Even with a thick sock it was large. Calf fits beautifully. Sleek, soft leather so comfortable! Highly recommend. It was a quick and easy exchange.
customer_reviews.author: DorPiz

customer_reviews.title: Not for Wide Calves
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited when I read the product details and it said the boot opening was 18" around... There is NO part of this boot's shaft that is 18" around so I will be sending it right back. I wear a size 6 and this is how the boot actually measures: Ankle - 11.25", Middle of boot shaft (widest part) - only 15.5", top/ opening of boot - 17". All my measurements are from the outside of the boot, so the boots are actually a bit smaller as far as fit goes. It is too bad since it is a really pretty boot.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Ng

customer_reviews.title: Go at least 1 size up!
customer_reviews.text: These are beautiful leather boots, but man do they run small!! I'm a true 7 1/2 and, upon recommendation of other reviews, ordered an 8. I could barely get my foot in! I probably need more like an 8 1/2, which is just crazy to me considering I've never been bigger than an 8 (and that's in running shoes). They are a true wide calf boot, however the width of the shafts seems to be more at the opening than in the actual calf area. With that being said, my 16 1/2" athletic calves still fit with wiggle room (for tucked in jeans).
customer_reviews.author: BHops

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Leather!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband to give to me for Christmas ( Ha Ha....then I get what I really want!!) The leather is so soft & a true black in color. I love the low heel too.....cause I'm too old for anything too high! Although I have not worn them yet (It's not Christmas yet!!) I did try them on and they are very true to size & comfortable. You can always buy cheaper, non leather boots, but WHY? I will be wearing these great boots for many years to come!
customer_reviews.author: parliegirl

customer_reviews.title: The boots will be a little small at first as the leather stretches
customer_reviews.text: THESE ARE AMAZING! I live in Idaho where we get very harsh winters..this past winter bring the worst in ten years. These boots survived through all of that and still look great. I used Nor-V-Gen shoe paste to protect the leather. The soles are a little slick w/o much tread and are the first this to shoe wear. This is the first pair of cute boots I have had that have lasted the entire fall and winter. Note that the boots will feel pretty small the first week or so that you wear them, but the leather will asjust to your perfect fit.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Nutsch

customer_reviews.title: Narrow Toe Box
customer_reviews.text: I've been a Sam Edelman fan for some time now, mainly because they make larger sizes. I really liked the look of these boots so I gave them a go after my last pair of black riding boots finally died. These are very attractive and sleek looking. Sadly they're a bit narrower in the toe box than my previous Sam Edelman boots in the same size. I can only wear them a short while before they're making my toes cramp up. I'm disappointed by them but needed them for work so I kept them, when I probably should have returned them for a better fit. Overall, I did like them, just wished they have had a wide option.
customer_reviews.author: NSN

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous boots
customer_reviews.text: I have literally been on a quest for leather boots for several years. My issue has always been my calves (15 1/2 inches). After returning several pairs purchased online, I swore to not buy online.Since I never found any I liked in stores, I decided to try online again. The reviews for these boots, gave me the confidence to order. I love them! The leather is soft and buttery. The calves are definitely wide enough and I can wear with skinny jeans and still have plenty of room. Several folks suggested to size up a half. I decided to size up a whole and am glad I did.
customer_reviews.author: Ilene G.

customer_reviews.title: Poor Workmanship
customer_reviews.text: These boots are NOT what I would ever expect from Sam Edelman. They came with random brown stains on the cheaply made leather with the seams at the top of the boot poorly sewed on with jagged cut edges. I just couldn't believe the poor workmanship of these boots when I pulled them out of the box. While these boots do fit as expected, the front ankle part of the boots was very baggy and made a sort of pouch as you stood in the boots and look down. While these boots look pretty online, in person they are a poorly constructed mess!
customer_reviews.author: Chelsee

customer_reviews.title: Will require treatment to prevent water damage
customer_reviews.text: I was very hesitant to order these boots.. I have muscular calves and one foot slightly larger than the other. I'm very happy with the quality and their appearance. I was slightly disappointed to find an unfinished opening on the inside top of each boot. The opening hides an elastic panel that wasn't pictured or included in the discription. I'm so happy with the rest of the boot and even with my wife calves.. (or is it calf's... My legs are a bit beefy so either apply..) there isn't a gap and the elastic remains hidden. I'm going to oil the leather because it is obvious water will create spots.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth white

customer_reviews.title: Possible knock-offs? Not convinced.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these in black to replace my last pair of black Sam Edelman’s riding boots. I loved those boots. They were a buttery leather, great rubber sole, perfect fit. And I wore them until I actually physically injured myself. Lol! I ordered these boots because they looked the same and have the same label/name. However, the material is more plastic-y than my previous ones. And they smelled more of plastic than of leather! They arrived in the Sam Edelman box and had the tag, but unless this label changed their materials, I guess they must be knock-offs. Like I said, I wore my last pair for years, and these were sadly not the same. :(
customer_reviews.author: Jaclyn Kurash

customer_reviews.title: Don't believe the other reviews
customer_reviews.text: My calf measurement is 17.5" at the widest point (as measured by my OCD engineer husband). There were multiple reviews saying these are fine for 18" and a few even said 19" calf sizes. WRONG! I could barely get them to zip over just a pair of very thin knee-high compression socks. They also bunched at the ankle. Finally, I think the toe looked more pointed than it did in the pictures. I gave them 2 stars because the construction and materials looked good.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Chaney

customer_reviews.title: Order size up
customer_reviews.text: Love love my boots!! After reading reviews, I decided to go 1/2 size bigger and I am glad I did! I normally wear a size 8 in everything sandals, boots tennis shoes , flats. So I would definitely say theses are sized on the small end and a little narrow at the foot. But my 8.5 size fits perfect! The calf area is a little roomy not to big either. If you have big calfs then it might would be a tight fit. Overall great boot!
customer_reviews.author: S.M

customer_reviews.title: BUYER BEWARE!!
customer_reviews.text: If you have wide calves Avoid this boot! For starters the previous reviews about the saggy ankle is extremely accurate unfortunately! Very saggy and non flattering boot on. The zipper is in the back at the meat of the calf ,So it’s impossible to zip if you have larger legs. Why not Put the zipper on the side like most boots ?That would just be too easy and convenient these boots are difficult, they don’t look like advertised and they’re not worth the price at all!
customer_reviews.author: Map

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful boots, but...
customer_reviews.text: I never, ever, ever leave reviews, and I’m pretty disappointed to be leaving this one, but after only two wears, the zipper on these “athletic cut” boots split completely. They are absolutely gorgeous and exactly what I was looking for, but the zipper did not stand up to wear for even two days. My calves are athletic, yes. The boots zipped both times and then midway through the second wear, this happened. I’m so sad as I really thought I had found a replacement for my beloved Nine West Americana riding boots.
customer_reviews.author: M. Wicker

customer_reviews.title: A little large but nice
customer_reviews.text: I like these boots for the cost but gave them 4 stars for the fit. They are a 7 1/2 wide, which granted isn’t my usual size, but I’m on the borderline of medium and wide, and decided to try these. They aren’t too wide, but they seem sized more as an 8 than a 7 1/2, and they flop up at the heel when I walk. They were a gift, so I’m keeping them, but I’d order a half size down if I were to purchase again
customer_reviews.author: Laurie

customer_reviews.title: These could be nice boots. The leather is really nice and smells ...
customer_reviews.text: These could be nice boots. The leather is really nice and smells great. They seems a little fragile though. When I got them, they came with a few nicks in the leather already and part of the boot looked like it had chemicals spilled on it (liquid-like spots not matching the other coloring pattern). I wasn't a big fan of the way the toes are black and fade into brown. It's not a smooth fade at all and there are super tiny black specks over the rest of the boot. I might have kept them if I ordered half a size up and a different color.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wanted to love and keep these boots so badly
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to love and keep these boots so badly, the overall fit of this boot was not what I expected. I was hoping for a looser fit in the calf as well as foot bed. I bought the wide calf thinking they would be a lot bigger around as my calf measures just over 16”. The color was also a little lighter than that of the pictures. Over all boots are very pretty and well made. Maybe if Sam Edelman made a boot that was more for the plus size 17” or better on the calf size, I would definitely consider another purchase.
customer_reviews.author: JULES

customer_reviews.title: High quality, beautiful, simple boots
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a pair of black leather boots for a while and these are perfect! Simple enough that they aren't distracting, but some cute embellishments keep them from looking like part of a uniform. Nice grippy soles with traction - a welcome change to the Franco Sartos I typically buy that have zero traction. These fit my calves perfectly; I am somewhere in between a regular and wide calf, so I would say for a wide calf boot these are fairly narrow. The foot bed was tight at first but with a few wears they stretch out and conform to your feet. Thick, soft leather. Very happy so far!
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Woods

customer_reviews.title: Really great boots for wider calves!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE these boots SO much!! I am a tall size 14 gal with long very muscular legs and these fit my calves so awesomely! They are also extremely comfortable. I have received so many compliments on them. It seems like boots these days are made for size 2 girls with very thin legs. No shade meant, it has just been hard for me to find stylish boots to fit my calves. I think these boots are well made and well priced for their quality.
customer_reviews.author: D. R. Toscano

customer_reviews.title: Not really wide width.
customer_reviews.text: These had to go back. They are wide and wide calf. The calf was so wide, it looked silly but the width wasn't wide at all. I could barely get my foot in and certainly wasn't comfortable. It's a shame because I love the style of this boot and the leather looked decent quality. It's smooth, not really pebbled texture.
customer_reviews.author: Marilys

customer_reviews.title: Wide is not very wide
customer_reviews.text: Based on other reviews, I ordered a wide, normally I do not need wide. They actually were not wide at all in the toe box or the calf. They are gorgeous, but they just didn't fit and I even went up a 1/2 size. Also, they did not come in the original box, they came in an Amazon box and no where on the boot did it say the size. I was looking to "make sure" I was sent the wide size, but couldn't find the size anywhere nor did it have the usual print of "Leather upper" etc... a little sketchy.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Herriges

customer_reviews.title: Buy this if your calves are super curvy and you have wide toes
customer_reviews.text: I was gifted the wrong model for Christmas. The calf was comically too big for me. I felt like a caricature of a pirate. It was bad. I sadly returned the boots. These are lovely, seemingly well made boots. Unfortunately I didn't get to put them through their paces but the look and feel of the construction was fabulous. The shape of the sole fits my wide toe box that seems impossible to fit.
customer_reviews.author: Trixie Copperton

customer_reviews.title: Perfect in every way!
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots so much that I bought them in every color. I have wide feet and calves and the wide width/wide calf is perfect with enough room to wear over jeans and leggings. I'm 5'1 and these boots rise just below my knee, which I like. I wear wear them to work and casually with jeans, leggings and skirts. My go to boots. The grey color, which is hard to find, is very nice and the brown is a rich, classy color. They are really comfortable, slip on and off easily and can be worn all day. My go to boots.
customer_reviews.author: B. Capone

customer_reviews.title: Quality Boots
customer_reviews.text: I really love these boots and I get compliments on them every time I wear them! I did buy a half size up, which I normally do with riding boots, and they are still pretty tight. As long as I don't wear wool socks, they fit fine. They do take a while to stretch naturally, which I think I am still breaking into. I am petite, so they are quite tall on me, which I don't love, but I still get a lot of compliments.
customer_reviews.author: Apple user

customer_reviews.title: Sam Edelman
customer_reviews.text: Hey, if you can fit these boots, I HIGHLY recommend them!! They are like BUTTER! The leather is so awesome. I'm thankful that they didn't fit. Because I could never use these for english riding. They are just tooooo beautiful and I'd ruin them. They are perfect for dressing up! Highly recommend! I'm just too petite!
customer_reviews.author: surfergal46

customer_reviews.title: Rip-off!Check where boot is coming from or try on in store first
customer_reviews.text: Update-Do not buy unless certain of size. I not only had to pay for return charged another $37 saying I didn’t follow instructions correctly. Out of pocket $70 and nothing to show for it. The boot was good quality leather and had a stylish look that would go well with dresses or jeans. My boot Fit too tight, so I'm sending back. I unfortunately didn't realize where the boot was shipped from (Canada) and had to pay $30 to return.
customer_reviews.author: PPS

customer_reviews.title: Shoe itself is so narrow it breaks my heart
customer_reviews.text: Reading the reviews, I was hopeful about these boots. They’re incredibly gorgeous, and the leather is smooth and soft. Amazingly made. However, they run so narrow. I’m used to sizing up in boots due to wide feet, so instead of my usual 8 1/2, I purchased a 10. The shoe itself was both entirely too big, yet still too narrow. I was pretty bummed; they’re gorgeous boots, and I’ve been lusting over them for a while now. Clearly they’re not meant for me. I’ll have to live! The calf was very roomy - if you run narrow but with a wide calf, these are for you. I hope you enjoy them. I wish so badly they had worked for me.
customer_reviews.author: Mary B.

customer_reviews.title: they fit over my calves!
customer_reviews.text: I love the look and feel of the leather. They bag a bit around my ankles which is surprising for me, so that is a kind of an akward look. And I have to insert an arch support, if I want to wear them for a long period of time . But they fit! I love boots, and have been unable to find any of quality without spending $$$'s So these boots made my A list!
customer_reviews.author: yw

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful boots, reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: These are great boots. I had been looking at the more expensive Frye boots but I need a wider calf and just didn't want to spend so much money. I have about a muscular calf that measures almost 16 inches and the regular calf version of these boots fits me snugly with skinny jeans on. The wide width would be far too wide for me.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren CTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Boots fit ok Quality is OK
customer_reviews.text: These boots are ok. I have large ankles and large calves. They just fit. They lookfine too. They are comfortable enoughand I am keeping them. I wish the quality was a little better. Yes they are leather, but really just barely. Its very thin and I don't think its especiallygood quality. I fee like they look kind of cheap and arent going to last very long. I would have paid more for better quality boots, if I could find them to fit me.
customer_reviews.author: Kmckinna

customer_reviews.title: Great for Big Calves
customer_reviews.text: I am plus size and my calves are about 16" around. I've struggled to find plain black riding boots that are knee high, that will fit my calves without having ugly stretch panels. I bought these and struggled to zip them up at first. But I am wearing them for the 2nd time today and they zipped up perfectly. Stretched just enough to now fit like a glove. So if you have 16" calves and are wondering if these will fit, at first they will be tight but quickly they will be awesome.
customer_reviews.author: V. Spain

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: Boots are not bad. I only wish they had arrived in better condition. They look to have a few scratches in various places on both boots. Over all though, I like them. They fit will around my 16.10” calves, with a little extra room for some thicker boot socks or leg warmers. Nice everyday boots you can dress up or down. For reference, I followed other reviewers and ordered a half size up from my normal size and they fit great. Not too big at all. I’ll post pics later.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie W.

customer_reviews.title: Love these boots
customer_reviews.text: They took a while to come but I didn’t know they were coming from Canada but they were perfect and I want to thank the seller for responding when I asked why they’re taking so long and I apologize for being a little impatient. I love them.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn / Eva

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, Well Made Boot
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots. I struggle with arch support in most shoes and this has enough support that I don't need to put inserts in. Most boots are way too tight on my calves as well and these are quite comfortable. Nice leather and seem to be well made and they look great! They were a little snug on the sides when I first received, but I thought a size up would be too big. After wearing, they stretched out so are comfortable in the width as well. Very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Much too small all around
customer_reviews.text: Arrived looking like they had been tried on and returned by another customer. Sticker removed from the sole of right boot and white dog hair was stuck to the adhesive. Boots were very narrow and tight for size 8 (which I can usually wear with thick socks) and could not even zip up completely. They didn't fit at all like a wide-calf boot, and I don't even have the largest calves. Was just hoping to fit them over jeans with a little extra room. Leather was nice quality, though. I was really looking forward to these new boots. Damn!
customer_reviews.author: J Walker

customer_reviews.title: Quality leather, Fits 19’ calf
customer_reviews.text: When I got these boots I wanted to jump for joy because I have large calves and I haven’t been able to find good quality leather boots to fit in years . I am so happy to report that this ‘athletic cut’ from Sam Adelman fits my 19’ calves!! They are snug with jeans but they are comfortable, and the ankle is still slim and feminine, almost like they were custom made for me. Thanks Sam Edelman for a great quality leather riding boot!!!!! Soooo happy!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: If you're not a stick figure and actually have flesh attached to your leg bones, order the "wide" shaft.
customer_reviews.text: I don't wear riding boots. They don't go with my manly calves. But my wife loves them. She wears them all the time. I did originally order the regular shaft version for her, and they wouldn't even zip up around her calves (so I KNOW they wouldn't fit mine). We had to send them back and get the "wide" shaft versions. Now...my wife isn't fat. She's not even curvy. I'm just saying...the shafts in the regular version is apparently meant for stick legs. So, keep that in mind.
customer_reviews.author: CatSkinner

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots! I have them in brown so initially wanted a different style in black so I could have some variation in my wardrobe, but I tried another pair and I just didn't like them as much as the Penny! These are so comfortable, I've worn them for quite a bit of walking and my feet do not hurt at all. I love the full zip on the back because I have athletic calves, so the half-zip styles don't work for me. I also love the height of the boot. They're great, I love them, and I want more of them in other colors!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Jones

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful leather!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered several pairs of boots, and these had the best quality leather. However, the ankles were really wide and I was afraid the boots would slouch far more than I liked. While I have "athletic" calves, my ankles are relatively small. I think these boots would be ideal if your ankle measurement was more in proportion to your calves.
customer_reviews.author: Grad student

customer_reviews.title: Nice leather boots
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots. It’s hard to find good leather boots in a wide calf that also don’t have a high heel. My calf isn’t super thick and these just fit over jeans. My only issue was they arrived loose in a very large, generic cardboard box (no protection for the boots at all) and there was some sort of sticky substance on the front of one boot. I was able to get it off without marring the boot so I kept them.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Difficulty with zipper in back
customer_reviews.text: Boots run small in foot. They are not packed to keep the shaft rounded - folded flat and appear “pointed” front and back. Very difficult to zip in back because zipper seems to stick. These were a gift and cannot be returned because of the 30 day return policy. I suggest considering the full length back zipper before ordering.
customer_reviews.author: Judy R. Langrel

customer_reviews.title: I am happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: The foot bed is stiff and just a little tight. I'll wear them a few times and I think the leather is soft enough that they will conform to my feet. The shafts is definitely tighter than I expected. My calf measures 17-1/2 so I assumed there would be a little more room. All-in-All, I am happy with this purchase. When you wear a size,11 and need an extra wide calf it I'd difficult to find anything high quality leather that fits and zips. These should be perfect in a few weeks.
customer_reviews.author: CherDe

customer_reviews.title: and seemed comfortable since they have very soft leather
customer_reviews.text: I thought these were very cute. They are true to size, and seemed comfortable since they have very soft leather. That being said. I go through shoes like it's my job so the soft leather would probably make these boots wearable 1-2 season max. I ended up finding a pair of similar-looking Frye boots at a significant discount and I compared the soles and leather thickness and Frye won hands down. I took these back believing that Frye's would be a better long-term investment.
customer_reviews.author: Sehausle

customer_reviews.title: Favorite. Boots. Ever
customer_reviews.text: I got my first pair of these almost three years ago right before a trip to Ireland, wanting something sturdy to stand up to the cold and rain. Not only did these do the job for Ireland, but pretty much became my favorite shoe afterward. They have a classic look that can be dressed up or down easily. I literally wore them multiple times a week for two years before the boot heel finally fell off of one of the shoes. I bought another pair almost immediately. The wide calf is great- I don't have a super wide calf but it fits comfortable over jeans. I really cannot recommend these enough. I hope to eventually get them in another color.
customer_reviews.author: Anabel Lee Genevitz

customer_reviews.title: Well-Constructed and Simply Stylish But Less Wide Than Desired
customer_reviews.text: Well-constructed and simply stylish but less wide than I was hoping for. The width of the shaft is uncomfortably constricting at the highest point near the knee. The boots seem to be slightly wider than average up the leg but the shape around the foot itself is more narrow than I was expecting. I plan to try to make these work in the meantime but I wouldn't buy these specifically again.
customer_reviews.author: Evora Blake

customer_reviews.title: These boots fit comfortable around my calves even with jeans on and are ...
customer_reviews.text: As a woman with quite muscular, athletic calves buying boots can be a struggle. These boots fit comfortable around my calves even with jeans on and are made of buttery soft leather. I used a leather lotion on then right away to avoid stains and they have done well even walking through snow and puddles. The darker detail on the toe box and heel make for an elegant look. They seemed tight right away but even after a few minutes they loosened up (it could have been due to their cold temperature upon delivery). I happily endorse these boots!
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Fakes
customer_reviews.text: I have these boots already from last year (purchased at a reputable retail outlet) and upon opening the box I realized these were fake. Stiff, cheap leather, different shape toe box and overall design of boot. I put on one of each boot, and without even saying something to my husband his response was “You have 2 different boots on”. The logos are totally different too. Back you go!
customer_reviews.author: LDMCC

customer_reviews.title: Fit is off
customer_reviews.text: Like the leather, and ordered the wide calf. For a wide calf boot, the boot fit for the feet is extremely narrow! Now, I did wear for a while, and since they're leather, they did stretch in that area a bit. They're not as tall as I like, either. I'm only 5'4" so usually boots hit about my knees, but not these. Overall, the leather is nice, and the wide calf fit was fine on my calf. However...VERY narrow and shorter than most boots.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Engel

customer_reviews.title: Narrow foot, comfortable wide calf
customer_reviews.text: Returned because the boots were too tight in the foot. The wide leg was comfortable and the leather was very nice, but the foot was very narrow. Typically I would wear a 9.5 W - but can usually wear a regular 9.5 regular, depending on the style. I think this style runs narrow. I was so sad because the boots were beautiful and otherwise comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: VSL

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous boots
customer_reviews.text: My local store didn't carry the wide width, but honestly there's not much difference in fit between the wide and regular with size, so my toes are sore by the end of the day. I'd suggest grabbing a shoe insert too, because there's not much padding or support inside. I've gotten a ton of compliments on the boots and I love the color.
customer_reviews.author: kristin

customer_reviews.title: A nice leather Boot
customer_reviews.text: Fits as expected after I read all the reviews; and the calf fits loosely. I like it that way so I can wear more than skinny jeans with them. I get a lot of compliments when I wear them. The foot isn't tight on me. I feel like it molds comfortably to your foot. To sum it up: a nice leather boot for a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Mom2sweetp

customer_reviews.title: These look cheap and note well mad; color doesn't match image
customer_reviews.text: I ordered whiskey leather, and the color was much more orange and lighter than the dark/reddish brown shown on Amazon. The stitching looked poorly done in some locations, and I genuinely wondered if these were even really leather. They smelled like leather, so maybe they were just cheaply done leather. Either way, major disappointment, so I returned them.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: Best boot investment ever!
customer_reviews.text: The wide version are perfect for my calves. I am a size 12 US in clothing, so if you are more plus size and typically buy wide calf boots from plus size websites, you may find that the calf on these are not wide enough. That being said, I LOVE the quality of these. This is my 2nd pair. I bought these used from a consignment store about 5 years ago and they held up for years. I finally replaced them and am so glad these are still available. Best boot investment ever!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute boot but not for a wide calf
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these as one of my best friends LOVES them. I took a chance. They didn't work for me unfortunately. I bought these and a pair of Fryes because I've been having so much trouble with my calf size. I thought they would be a little wider in the calf, however, they weren't. They're cute and soft pebbled leather. My main problem was I probably needed a larger size in the in the foot (the sides and back zipper were rubbing my foot) and defiantly need a wide calf. Overall super cute and whatnot but not as good a quality as Frye.
customer_reviews.author: MrsReview

customer_reviews.title: Love, love, love these boots!
customer_reviews.text: It was love at first sight when I spotted these on a Nordstrom's FB ad, but promptly tracked them down on Amazon. They fit as described: a little narrow, not super roomy/not sloppy, but true to my size and comfortable with a standard sock. I wear them with leggings or skinny jeans tucked in and they are about as snug as my other boots. The color is gorgeous and I've received lots of compliments already with that striking back zipper and snap tab closure. I've worn them twice all day and my feet were not the least bit sore. I don't usually have great luck buying shoes online, but I'm thrilled with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl P

customer_reviews.title: Cute but not t0o great!
customer_reviews.text: I got this shoe as part of my prime wardrobe order and sadly had to return it. The style is gorgeous but I felt it was really tight around the calf area and my calves are pretty average (wear size 10 pants). These were tight over a pair of skinny jeans and were also a little uncomfortable for wide feet. Wish it was a little wider and the width was better.
customer_reviews.author: sugarlette

customer_reviews.title: Nice soft leather and solid construction
customer_reviews.text: Nice leather, great color, solid construction. I have the grey ones I ordered last year, and they have held up really well. I am usually 8, and ordered 8 in whiskey (for this order), but the footbed was too narrow. Length was fine, and calf was perfect. I sent these back, and will order 1 size up.
customer_reviews.author: Legal Begal

customer_reviews.title: Classy yet comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots! This is the second pair I have purchased. The first pair is now 5 years old with new heels but still wearable albeit the inner lining is getting a bit threadbare. My new boots are now my dressy ones. Both pairs of boot were comfortable for the first day. I wear an 11N and can wear with or without orthotics and be comfie. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Marni

customer_reviews.title: Great Boots!
customer_reviews.text: I have such a hard time finding boots that fit my calves and these do with room to spare! I find that sam edelman shoes fit my feet very well and these do too. They are made of nice feeling leather and construction seems up to standard. For reference I am 5'6, 180, and generally wear a size 8 shoe.
customer_reviews.author: k

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed. Quality does not match price point.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these boots in a black wide based off the reviews and suggested sizing although I never buy wide. I received the boots and they were too loose around the calf area. I like a more fitting look. The quality also wasn’t great. The feel and look seemed cheap. I have purchased other boots at this same price point that are far better quality. I returned immediately. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: These are some beautiful boots. I took a chance and hoped these would fit over my athletic, 15" calves, and they DO fit, but with no room in the calves for socks or leggings. The leather is soft and supple yet strong. I'm going to return these and try the wide-calf version. The foot is comfortable. I wear 10 1/2 and bought 11's and there's room for an insole.
customer_reviews.author: KA

customer_reviews.title: Love these back-zip boots
customer_reviews.text: These boots are very comfortable to wear. I wear them all day at work and come home still comfortable. I would like to get the grey pair too. I love that they zip in the back as I think side zippers detract from the overall style of any boot. Again, I love them.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Critique

customer_reviews.title: Athletic Fit, Slim ankle
customer_reviews.text: These boots are my new favorites! The leather is soft and beautiful. I wanted to write this review to bring up a point I didn't see in other reviews. When the boots arrived, the box said "athletic fit" rather than "wide calf" That being said, I believe they are styled with a wider calf, while remaining slim in the ankle and foot. I'm 5"10 and the widest part of my calf is 16.5". these boots leave me sufficient room to wear them over jeans with a little gap.
customer_reviews.author: Team Primo

customer_reviews.title: Heel too tight
customer_reviews.text: Looked very nice but the heel portion was too tight. Couldn't close zipper once foot was inside because heel area was too tight.
customer_reviews.author: Saul Nathanson

customer_reviews.title: Heel fell off after wearing for 2 weeks
customer_reviews.text: These boots don't seem to be made as well as their price suggests. After wearing these for less than 2 weeks, the heel came unglued. DO NOT call Sam Edelman. They will require you to send back at your own cost so that they can determine that they are defective and then maybe issue you a refund in 4-6 weeks. After speaking to them I called Amazon and a new pair is coming and, once I receive it, I can return the defective ones. I was so dissapointed in the quality of these shoes and Sam Edelman's customer service. I do not recommend spending your money on this brand.
customer_reviews.author: AmDF

customer_reviews.title: Cute Black Boots
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of the same boot. The first pair lasted for about 5 years and was looking a little rough, so I decided to replace them. New pair identical except for wear and tear. These are great boots and a good price for how long they hold up. I like them because there is not much of a heel, but they still look stylish.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfectly in every way ... and is great for walking
customer_reviews.text: These boots are just as comfortable as walking in sneakers all day. But much more stylish! There was plenty of room in the toe box and there were no spots that were rubbing. The calf width was perfect even though I'm on the smaller calf size. Color is beautiful - has a bit of a worn in brown tone.
customer_reviews.author: Alli V.

customer_reviews.title: Didn't fit.
customer_reviews.text: Too big through the ankle and calf. Bummer, but informative. If this boot is the measure, I have a normal foot, narrow ankle, and incredibly small calf. These were way loose heel up, but fit through the foot. Reasonably well made, just didnt fit for me.
customer_reviews.author: MACW

customer_reviews.title: Comfy out of box
customer_reviews.text: I thought I was going to have a break in period for these boots, but they fit and we’re comfy right out of the box. I have a job where I’m on my feet all day and these are just as comfortable in the afternoon as they are in the morning.
customer_reviews.author: korny518

customer_reviews.title: So Sad I had to return this boot.
customer_reviews.text: Eventhough I returned this boot, I had to write a positive review for this product. I returned this boot because it was too loose in the calf area. But the boot is a quality boot, made for customers looking for wide width calf boots.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: SO glad I splurged and bought these boots!
customer_reviews.text: I have large calves and have a hard time finding tall boots that fit. These fit beautifully. The largest part of my calf is 17 inches with jeans on -- these boots fit! The zipper up the back of the boot is a nice touch too. The other thing I really like about the boots is the toe design -- they look good over your pants but if you wear them under boot cut jeans, it looks like you have a pair of western boots on (think Justin Ropers). The leather is very nice quality too.
customer_reviews.author: CND

customer_reviews.title: Perfect wide calf leather boots!
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots! I just got them and they fit my very curvy/athletic calves as well as my small ankles and narrow feet. They fit my narrower feet perfectly, so if you're average or verging on wide, I'd definitely order the wide version. I ordered 8 and it seems true to size. The leather is gorgeous, the style is great and they're very comfortably balanced! Woul
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: It’s so hard to find 10.5 shoes and boots and these were lovely and well made, too. I ordered wide calf, and honestly, probably could’ve gotten by with regular calf - they’re very generous. In addition , these are tall boots that come up to my knees (and I’m 5’9”) so my shorter sisters may want to look for better scaled options.
customer_reviews.author: Gwen

customer_reviews.title: Heel Fell Off Almost Immediately
customer_reviews.text: I have always had good luck with Sam Edelman shoes but these boots were so disappointing. The heel of the boot was glued on and fell off while I was walking down the street. This happened the third time I'd worn them. I then had to limp around for the rest of the day. I am still waiting to hear back from Sam Edelman on how I will be able to return these. All in all, these are cheaply made and I would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: William Ricker

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and the zipper on these goes all the way up. I wish they were a bit stiffer as they crease at the ankles a lot, but they’re gorgeous and fit true to size.
customer_reviews.author: T. Lackey

customer_reviews.title: Penny2 Boot
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these in a 9M black. I really should not of sized up from my regular 8.5M. Other than I have more room in the foot than needed, the fit was good. I have a large calf about 16.5 inches, they fit with no problem. I usually purchase Frye products, but I thought I would try these since the wide calf was wider than what Frye offered. Nice boot, not the same quality, but half the price. All and all, I'm pleased and will keep the boot.
customer_reviews.author: New Jersey

customer_reviews.title: Love these boots, so will you!!!
customer_reviews.text: As fall approaches I immediately thought of these new boots I have. They are top notch in quality, the color is rich and gorgeous, and are very comfortable. I would say they fit true to size and the calf is wide for athletic or toned legs, but not for "heavy" legs honestly. I can wear normal width in other boots but I didn't like the snug feeling with jeans or if I wanted to wear boot liners for more style. In most instances you get what you pay for in shoes, which holds true with these boots. They are worth every penny and are a staple in my wardrobe.
customer_reviews.author: TBPB108

customer_reviews.title: Calf was too wide
customer_reviews.text: The foot of this boot is lovely and comfortable. However, the CALF is very big. I have smaller calves. It’s been frustrating to find a boot with wide foot and regular calf. I did return these and Amazon (as they do so well) refunded my $. If you have a wide foot and wide calf, you might like these.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Urban Professionals in Snowy Climates will ❤️
customer_reviews.text: Great boot. I bought it in brown and black. Fits beautifully, comfortable for walking distances. Good traction in snow.. Neutral enough style wise to look right with many outfits. Neither “too much” nor “too little” for a broad spectrum (casual to smart)
customer_reviews.author: Bookish Meritocratist

customer_reviews.title: These boots are of good quality, are truly made for a wider calf
customer_reviews.text: These boots are of good quality, are truly made for a wider calf, the angled opening & back zipper with button closure is fantastic, AND the color is on point. My calf measures exactly with most regular boots so having a loose opening is a welcome change. I will say, you truly need to have a wider/athletic calf for this to work. If the circumference is less than 14 inches DO NOT get this boot in wide (get the regular). You also must adjust the zipper flap when you first place your foot in them to keep it flush (and not rub your heel) when you zip.
customer_reviews.author: holly

customer_reviews.title: Great boots!
customer_reviews.text: Really beautiful, soft leather. Great color. Fit is great too- shaft circumference is as advertised. One of the zippers is a bit sticky at the bottom, and one of the boots rubbed my heel pretty badly, but I’m hoping that because they’re leather they will wear in. So far, happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Starshine109

customer_reviews.title: Great wide calf option
customer_reviews.text: I love having a quality wide-calf boot. These fit me perfectly, over jeans and pants and thick socks. I had to super glue the heel pad back on for one shoe, which is annoying but was manageable. These look great.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew & Jordan Zimmermann

customer_reviews.title: Not wide calf
customer_reviews.text: These boots are definitely not wide calf. Couldn’t even get them zipped all the way up let alone think about tucking pants in. My calf’s are only between 16-17”. They were beautiful boots- so disappointed. They are going back.
customer_reviews.author: DeniseM

customer_reviews.title: Great Looking & comfy feeling boot!
customer_reviews.text: I love this boot! It’s perfect! The toe box was definitely tight when i first put it on, but after a couple of wears, it’s loosened and now fits just right. I’m a size 8, and it fits perfectly. I ordered it in another color! Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Marwa A Jad

customer_reviews.title: Not for wide calves
customer_reviews.text: These boots did NOT fit my 16” calves. Disappointed with not being able to zip the last 3 inches of zipper because of this. Had to return. Otherwise, they are beautiful. Not for ladies with wide calves.
customer_reviews.author: TealGeology

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with these boots
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots! The fit is excellent for my long foot, comfortable toe box, and I wear socks with boots. The shaft is higher than some other boots and looks good over jeans and under skirts. Nice leather, sleek, elegant style. Zips up the back, so easy on and off. I’m very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Waldo

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THESE BOOTS!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have large calves and have never found a pair of tall boots that fit me. These are great quality leather and have broken in quite nicely. I get lots of compliments on them and they are now my go-to pair of footwear for the fall.
customer_reviews.author: Julia L.W. Detwiler

customer_reviews.title: Way too narrow.
customer_reviews.text: Great boot, but , as everyone says, waaay too narrow. The customer service was great. Good company. If you have narrow feet and order wide, you may be in luck.. These are great boots
customer_reviews.author: Gardener

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THEM!!!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE MY NEW BOOTS!!! Fit just as expected, true to size I'm generally a 7 1/2 but as everyone knows with boots you always buy a bigger sz.. These are the perfect color and exactly as described!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Sam Edelman Women's Penny 2 Wide-Shaft Riding Boot
feature_bullets: Riding-inspired boot with asymmetric shaft and single ear pull with embossed button
Full-length back zipper with snap tab
